64267.「……ぷっはー！ 生き返ったわーい。\n もう少しで 塩コンブになるところじゃっ:
Phew...! That was a close one. Almost turned
into kelp chips!

64268.「砂漠で干からびかけて ここに避難したんじゃが\n 水を求めて ツボに入ってみた:
The desert was too dry, so I took refuge in
here. I thought there'd be water in this
pot, but it was empty...

64269.「しかも 一度 入ったら\n 今度は 出れなくなってしもうたんじゃ。\n まった:
And once I was inside, I couldn't get back
out... This body really is getting on my
last nerve...

64270.「それはそうと 見知らぬ者よ。\n 名は 何と申す？:
Now then, you're an unfamiliar face.
Who are you?

64271.「……ふむ。<pc>か。\n 突然の頼み 聞いてくれて助かったぞよ。\n ご苦労:
<pc>, hm? I see. I really
appreciate your help on such a whim. Please
accept this as my thanks!

64272.「はっ！ 動けるようになったのなら\n 一刻も早く 我が国に……\n アラハギー:
Yes, of course! If I'm able to move now, I
must return to my kingdom! I have to go back
to Al-Ahagiro as soon as possible!

64273.「ふふっふー。\n ワシ こう見えて\n アラハギーロの王様なんじゃよ。:
Heh, heh. You probably couldn't tell from my
appearance, but I'm actually Al-Ahagiro's
king.

64902.<pc>は オアシスの水を\nツボの中に 注ぎ込んだ！:
<pc> poured the Oasis Water into the
pot!

64903.中から 声が 聞こえてくる……。: You heard a voice coming from inside...

64904.「うっひょーい！ これは まぎれもなく\n 我がアラハギーロの オアシスの水じゃ:
Whew! This certainly is water from my
Al-Ahagiro oasis, no doubt!

64905.なんと ツボの中から\nわかめ王子が あらわれた！: Suddenly, a King Kelp emerged from the pot!

64906.「ム……。その顔は…… 疑っておるな？\n ホントじゃもん！\n 国に来てみれば:
Hmm.... you don't believe me, do you? Well,
it's true! Seriously! Come to my kingdom,
and you shall see!

64907.「おっと！ こうしてはおれぬ。\n さらばじゃ <pc>！:
Oops! I've stayed here for too long!
Farewell, <pc>!
